title: The Rose of the World
description: The brilliant conclusion to the "fascinating" (Anne McCaffrey) Fool's Gold trilogy, The Rose of the World features one of the most dynamic and charismatic heroines to ever grace the pages of a fantasy novel. The godlike entity, Rosa Eldi, has escaped the clutches of the evil sorcerer Rahe. But will she regain her memory and restore her world before man's baser nature triumphs and brings ruin to Elda forever?
author: Jude Fisher
